About

I'm a graduate student in Psychology, at UNAM. Right now I'm working in publising the data of my thesis which was about comparing Interval Effects in intertemporal choice with intransitivity in Risky choice.

Research interests

In general, I'm very interested in inquiring the variables that make certain behaviours more likely. Specifically, the areas that attract me the most are: Intertemporal Choice, Risky choice, Interval effects, transitivity, Psychological Mathematical Modelling, Bayesian Inference and the applicability of psychological knowledge in Public Policies.
